Q_DESC:
Alis Last Chance Gas station sits on Route 190 on the edge of Death Valley. There is no other gas station for 400 miles. You are to write a program to help drivers decide if they need gas. 
The program asks for : 

1.Capacity of the tank (in gallons)
2.The available gas in the tank, in gallons as shown in indicator (in %)
3.The miles per gallon of the car. 
The program then writes out "Get Gas " or "Safe to Proceed" depending on if the car can cross the 200 miles with the gas remaining in the tank.
